# addWorkoutEvents(_:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a workout event to the builder.

## Declaration

```swift
func addWorkoutEvents(_ workoutEvents: [HKWorkoutEvent], completion: @escaping (Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func addWorkoutEvents(_ workoutEvents: [HKWorkoutEvent]) async throws
```

## Adding events to the workout

- **workoutEvents**: The list of events added to the workout.
